name: Craft Lands
description:
Let's develop the village!
Craft Lands is a development simulation game where you plant trees in a vast empty space and develop a village.
Defend your village from enemies, plant trees and get resources. Use the resources to build houses and increase the number of residents.
However, residents' satisfaction remains low with just building houses. It would be better to build a lookout tower, prepare a park, and plant some trees.
What kind of village you create is entirely up to you.
